question: How do you use fixtures in Cypress component testing to provide mock data to your components?
answer: Use cy.fixture() to load JSON files and pass them as props to components in mount() or mountHook() commands.
diagram:
flowchart TD
  A[Test Starts] --> B[Load Fixture with cy.fixture]
  B --> C[Mount Component with Fixture Data]
  C --> D[Assert Component Behavior]
  D --> E[Test Completes]
